00011 #include "NveIntegrator.h"

00014 #include <ddMd/storage/AtomIterator.h>

00016 #include <ddMd/potentials/pair/PairPotential.h>

00018 #include <util/global.h>

00020 #include <iostream>

00022 namespace DdMd

00024    using namespace Util;

00026    /*
00027    * Constructor.
00028    */
00029    NveIntegrator::NveIntegrator(Simulation& simulation)
00030     : Integrator(simulation)
00031    {}

00039    /*
00040    * Read time step dt.
00041    */
00042    void NveIntegrator::readParam(std::istream& in)
00043    {
00044       //readBegin(in, "NveIntegrator");
00045       read<double>(in, "dt", dt_);
00046       //readEnd(in);
00047 
00048       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00049       if (!prefactors_.isAllocated()) {
00050          prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00051       }
00052 
00053    }
00054 
00055    void NveIntegrator::setup()
00056    {
00057       atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00058       exchanger().exchange();
00059       atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00060       pairPotential().findNeighbors();
00061       simulation().computeForces();
00062 
00063       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00064       double mass;
00065       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00066       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00067          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00068          prefactors_[i] = dtHalf/mass;
00069       }
00070    }
00071 
00072    /*
00073    * Integrate.
00074    */
00075    void NveIntegrator::run(int nStep)
00076    {
00077       if(domain().isMaster()) {
00078          Log::file() << std::endl;
00079       }
00080       nStep_ = nStep;
00081 
00082       // Set prefactor_[i] = 0.5*dt/mass for each atom type i.
00083       double mass;
00084       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00085       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00086          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00087          prefactors_[i] = 0.5*dt_/mass;
00088       }
00089 
00090       atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00091       exchanger().exchange();
00092       atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00093       pairPotential().findNeighbors();
00094       simulation().computeForces();
00095 
00096       simulation().diagnosticManager().setup();
00097 
00098       Vector        dv;
00099       Vector        dr;
00100       double        prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00101       AtomIterator  atomIter;
00102       bool          needExchange;
00103 
00104       // Main MD loop
00105       timer().start();
00106       exchanger().timer().start();
00107       pairPotential().timer().start();
00108       for (iStep_ = 0; iStep_ < nStep; ++iStep_) {
00109 
00110          if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00111             if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00112                simulation().diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00113             }
00114          }
00115          timer().stamp(Integrator::DIAGNOSTIC);
00116 
00117          // 1st half of velocity Verlet.
00118          atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00119          for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00120             prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00121    
00122             dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00123             atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00124    
00125             dr.multiply(atomIter->velocity(), dt_);
00126             atomIter->position() += dr;
00127     
00128          }
00129          timer().stamp(Integrator::INTEGRATE1);
00130    
00131          // Check if exchange and reneighboring is necessary
00132          //needExchange = simulation().needExchange();
00133          needExchange = atomStorage().needExchange(domain().communicator(), 
00134                                                  pairPotential().skin());
00135          timer().stamp(Integrator::CHECK);
00136 
00137          // Exchange atoms if necessary
00138          if (needExchange) {
00139             atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00140             exchanger().exchange();
00141             timer().stamp(Integrator::EXCHANGE);
00142             atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00143             pairPotential().findNeighbors();
00144             timer().stamp(Integrator::NEIGHBOR);
00145          } else {
00146             exchanger().update();
00147             timer().stamp(Integrator::UPDATE);
00148          }
00149    
00150          // Calculate new forces for all local atoms
00151          simulation().computeForces();
00152          timer().stamp(Integrator::FORCE);
00153    
00154          // 2nd half of velocity Verlet
00155          atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00156          for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00157             prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00158             dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00159             atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00160          }
00161          timer().stamp(Integrator::INTEGRATE2);
00162    
00163       }
00164       timer().stop();
00165       exchanger().timer().stop();
00166       pairPotential().timer().stop();
00167    }
00168 
00169 }
00170 #endif
